title: Drawing, "Constellation", 1930s
medium: Brush and watercolor, pen and black ink on cream paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: A figure wearing a black scarf and purple pants who seems to be flying through and over several arrows that are in spirals and straight lines; a blue circle in the upper right corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Constellation", 1930s.
1930s. Brush and watercolor, pen and black ink on cream paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-1063.
